title: [Gameplay] Omega Squad Teemo VO lines
body: When playing with the Omega Squad Teemo skin, it occasionally uses the classic voice over lines, rather than the skin voice over. It's quite strange to be playing with the Omega Squad skin and hearing a happy "hut, two, three, four" when moving. It's not a serious game changing bug, but it's quite annoying when your trying to play as a deranged spec ops Teemo.{{champion:17}}

replies.body:
Hey MagicFungiLord! 

Thanks so much for the report! We'll take a listen and see what's going on here! (Not sure why you'd want to hear Teemo in the first place, though. <3) Seriously, though, we'll check this out! :D
